# Dr. Raj Patel

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Nationality**: Indian
- **Age**: 38
- **Specialty**: Materials Science
- **Research Focus**: Microgravity effects on advanced composite materials
- **Years In Service**: 10
- **Education**: PhD in Materials Science from the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Chana Masala dehydrated pack
- **Hobbies**: Astrophotography and playing the guitar
- **Signature Experiment**: Leading research on carbon nanotube synthesis in microgravity environments
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Physical Fitness Routine**: Daily treadmill and resistance training
- **Language Proficiency**: English, Hindi, and Russian

## Relationships
- **Supervises**: [[commander_elena_vasilieva.md]]
- **Uses**: [[tranquility_node.md]]
- **Shares_Resources_With**: [[biologist_sofia_gomez.md]]

# Commander Elena Vasilieva

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Rank**: Commander
- **Nationality**: Russian
- **Age**: 42
- **Specialty**: Aerodynamics and Spacecraft Navigation
- **Years In Service**: 18
- **Hobbies**: Photography and Chess
- **Signature Work**: Pioneering advancements in the ISS's life support systems
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Borscht vacuum pack
- **Leadership Style**: Collaborative and Empathetic
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Education**: PhD in Aerospace Engineering from the Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology

## Relationships
- **Supervises**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]

# Tranquility Node

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: Life Support System
- **Type**: Entity
- **Location**: International Space Station
- **Maintenance Schedule**: Bi-weekly
- **Installation Date**: February 2010
- **Designed By**: European Space Agency in collaboration with NASA
- **Crew Capacity Support**: 6
- **Primary Function**: Housing for life support systems and crew quarters
- **Additional Function**: Backup air and water purification system
- **Notable Feature**: Contains the advanced oxygen generation system
- **Emergency Protocol**: Automated shutdown sequence in case of failure

## Relationships
- **Uses**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]

# Sofia Gomez

## Basic Information
- **Type**: Person
- **Nationality**: Argentinian
- **Age**: 34
- **Specialty**: Astrobiology
- **Research Focus**: Plant growth in microgravity
- **Years In Service**: 7
- **Education**: PhD in Biology from the University of Buenos Aires
- **Favorite Space Meal**: Empanadas dehydrated pack
- **Hobbies**: Sketching and playing the flute
- **Signature Experiment**: Investigating the effects of microgravity on plant genetic expression
- **Mission Allegiance**: ISS Expedition 68
- **Physical Fitness Routine**: Yoga and resistance training
- **Language Proficiency**: Spanish, English, and Russian

## Relationships
- **Shares_Resources_With**: [[dr._raj_patel.md]]

# Destiny Laboratory

## Basic Information
- **Entity Type**: Microgravity Research Lab
- **Type**: Entity
- **Location**: International Space Station
- **Construction Date**: 2001
- **Research Focus Areas**: Material science, fluid dynamics, combustion science, and astrobiology experiments
- **Support Systems**: Advanced life support and adaptive power management
- **Length**: 8.4 meters
- **Diameter**: 4.3 meters
- **Notable Experiment**: Microgravity science glovebox
- **Currently Assigned Crew Members**: 3
- **Collaborating Space Agencies**: NASA, ESA, JAXA, CSA
- **Primary User**: NASA

## Relationships
- **Conducts_Experiment_In**: [[biologist_sofia_gomez.md]]
